001package com.github.sormuras.bach.workflow;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.Bach;
004import com.github.sormuras.bach.Command;
005import com.github.sormuras.bach.Project;
006import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.Composer;
007import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.DefaultCommand;
008import com.github.sormuras.bach.project.ProjectSpace;
009
010/** A workflow-based builder of projects. */
011public record WorkflowBuilder(Bach bach, Project project) {
012
013  public void compile() {
014    for (var space : project.spaces()) compile(space);
015  }
016
017  public void compile(ProjectSpace space) {
018    runWorkflow(new CompileWorkflow(bach, project, space));
019  }
020
021  public void runAllTests() {
022    runAllTests(project.space("test"));
023  }
024
025  public void runAllTests(ProjectSpace space) {
026    runWorkflow(new RunAllTestsWorkflow(bach, project, space));
027  }
028
029  public void runModule(String module, Object... arguments) {
030    var space = project.spaces().values().get(0);
031    runModule(space, module, command -> command.addAll(arguments));
032  }
033
034  public void runModule(ProjectSpace space, String module, Composer<DefaultCommand> composer) {
035    var command = composer.apply(Command.of(module));
036    runWorkflow(new RunModuleWorkflow(bach, project, space, command));
037  }
038
039  public void runWorkflow(Workflow... workflows) {
040    for (var workflow : workflows) workflow.run();
041  }
042}
